word_mean: 复］排泄物：身体排出的废物

sentence.Network_en: The excreta of aquatic animals - fish, frogs, turtles, snakes, etc - contain similar refractory materials.
sentence.Network_cn: 水生动植物如鱼 、 蛙 、 龟 、 蛇等的排泄物中也会含有类似的难处理的物质.

sentence.Network_en: The collected excreta are homogenized, dried and finely ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把收集的排泄物进行均质化, 干燥并粉碎.

sentence.Network_en: The excreta of humans and land animals contain soluble refractory organic matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 人和陆生动物排泄物含有可溶的难处理有机物质.

list.abs: The selection of an appropriate excreta disposal system requires consideration of a number of factors ., 选择适当的排泄物处理系统需要考虑许多因素.
study on applying aerobic fermentation of livestock excreta to produce organic fertilizer ., 利用家畜粪便有氧发酵生产有机肥的研究.
Inadequate disposal of human excreta is a major health risk in emergency situations ., 在紧急情况下 , 人类排泄物的不适当处置是一个主要的健康危害.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Latin, 'things sifted out', neuter plural of excretus, past participle of excernere (see excrete)

entry.def: Excreta is the waste matter, such as urine or faeces, which is passed out of a person or animal's body.

means.word_mean: 1. waste matter (as urine or sweat but especially feces) discharged from the body
